comment: Dr. Smith is a teacher educator who cares. Her consistency in showing up to class with her 'teacher hat' on while balancing a genuine care for students is unmatched.

Dr. Smith is the most amazing teacher I have ever had to pleasure to have. She truly cares for the educational, emotional, and physical well being of all of her students. Her feedback is always positive but gives insightful points to make you better. She is absolutely the best person/professor at KSU.
